definition: see 一哄而散[yi1 hong1 er2 san4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: After the ritualist approach of eating and drinking, people disperse quickly.
sentences.chinese: 在做法事的道場上，人們喫喝一頓然後一鬨而散。

sentences.english: The cat catches a fat rat and scatters the others under the mat .
sentences.chinese: 那隻貓逮住了一隻碩鼠，墊子下面別的老鼠一鬨而散。

sentences.english: Then the financial mob turned and there was a frenzy to sell.
sentences.chinese: 最後，金融業的暴徒一鬨而散，大家搶着拋售。

sentences.english: The noisy boys scattered when the old man yelled at them.
sentences.chinese: 老人對這羣吵鬧的男孩一吼，他們便一鬨而散。
